home.title: Payment services for modern businesses
home.subtitle: Trusted digital payment services, company formation assistance, investment fund, and consulting services for entrepreneurs and businesses in France and Luxembourg

about.title: About Opulanz
about.subtitle: The All-in-One Enterprise Platform
about.storyIntro: Opulanz is part of the Advensys Luxembourg S.A. Group, a holding company with over 19 years of experience providing comprehensive business solutions across Europe. We built Opulanz with a clear vision: to become the European leader in corporate finance.
about.missionText: To improve the ecosystem of business financial services, payments, and operational processes using modern technology including AI and Blockchain.
about.visionText: To become the market leader in online business services in Europe, with financial and brokerage licenses enabling greater flexibility
about.storyClosing: Today, we serve commercial companies, financial institutions, investment funds, and freelancers across Europe. Our experienced team continues to innovate with cutting-edge technology while maintaining the highest standards of security, compliance, and customer service. We represent quality, trust, and innovation in corporate banking.
about.impactSubtitle: Our growth reflects the trust our clients place in us
about.strengthsDescription: Three key pillars of our success
about.strength1Description: Over 19+ years of experience serving commercial companies, financial institutions, and investment funds across Europe.
about.strength2Description: Complete business solution from company formation to financial services, accounting, tax advisory, investment, and insurance.
about.strength3Description: Leveraging Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain to make business financial services better, easier, and more efficient.
about.licensesDescription: We maintain all necessary licenses and certifications to provide business financial services across Europe, ensuring compliance with industry regulations and standards.
about.whyDescription: What makes us your trusted business financial partner
about.benefit1Description: Complete business solution covering company formation, financial services, accounting, tax advisory, investment, insurance, and more - all in one platform.
about.benefit2Description: Part of Groupe Advensys Luxembourg S.A., we bring nearly two decades of expertise in serving businesses across Europe.
about.benefit3Description: Built with cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain technology to provide efficient, secure, and innovative financial solutions.
about.benefit4Description: Specifically designed for commercial companies, financial institutions, investment funds, and freelancers - not retail banking.
about.benefit5Description: Operating across Europe, we maintain the highest standards of quality, trust, and compliance with financial regulations.
about.benefit6Description: Working towards full banking license with integrated blockchain and green technologies to lead the European online financial services market.
about.ctaDescription: Join thousands of businesses across Europe who trust Opulanz as their all-in-one financial and business solution platform.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Opulanz?
whyChooseUs.paragraph1: Opulanz brings together the best of traditional financial expertise and modern fintech innovation. As a fully regulated financial institution with presence in Luxembourg and France, we offer the security and reliability you need, combined with the flexibility and innovation you want.
whyChooseUs.paragraph2: Whether you're an individual looking for payment and investment services, or a business seeking comprehensive financial solutions, we have the expertise and services to support your success.

reasons.regulated: Regulated by ACPR and AMF for your peace of mind
reasons.expertise: Over 25 years of combined expertise in financial services
reasons.personalized: Personalized service from dedicated account managers
reasons.competitive: Competitive rates and transparent fee structure
reasons.multilingual: Multi-lingual support in English and French
reasons.comprehensive: Comprehensive suite of services under one roof

regulatory.title: Your Security is Our Priority
regulatory.description: We are regulated by leading European financial authorities, ensuring the highest standards of security and compliance.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Financial Excellence?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients who trust Opulanz for their financial needs. Open your account today and discover the difference.

layout.progressSaved: Your progress is automatically saved. You can return anytime to complete your application.

common.fileReqClear: Documents must be clear and legible
common.fileReqValid: All documents must be valid (not expired)
common.uploadLater: I'll upload documents later via my dashboard
common.uploadLaterDesc: You can submit your application now and upload documents later. We'll send you a secure link to your dashboard where you can complete the document upload.
common.uploadRequired: Please upload all required documents or select the option to upload later to continue.
common.completeRequired: Please complete all required fields to continue.
common.pepConfirmed: Confirmed: Not a Politically Exposed Person
common.consentProcessingDesc: I consent to Opulanz processing my personal data for the purpose of introducing me to Opulanz Partner Bank for account opening. This is required to proceed.
common.consentDataSharingDesc: I consent to Opulanz sharing my application data with partner banks and EMIs for the purpose of account opening and compliance checks. This is required to proceed.
common.consentMarketingDesc: I would like to receive updates, offers, and news from Opulanz about banking products and services. You can unsubscribe at any time.
common.gdprDesc: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, or port your data. You can also object to processing and withdraw consent at any time. See our Privacy Policy for details.
common.consentsRequired: Both required consents must be accepted to continue with your application.
common.applicationSubmittedDesc: Your application has been successfully submitted to Opulanz Partner Bank.
common.saveReference: Save this reference number for tracking your application
common.emailConfirmationDesc: We've sent a confirmation email with your application details and reference number.
common.bankReviewDesc: Opulanz Partner Bank will review your application and verify your documents. This typically takes 2-5 business days.
common.accountActivationDesc: Once approved, the bank will contact you directly to complete the account activation and provide your account details.
common.docUploadPendingDesc: You still need to upload your documents. We'll send you a secure link to your dashboard within 24 hours.
common.supportHours: Our support team is available Monday-Friday, 9:00-18:00 CET.
common.submittingWait: Please wait while we process your application...

personal.title: Open a Personal Account
personal.description: Complete your application in 6 simple steps

welcome.title: Welcome to Opulanz
welcome.description: Let's get started with opening your personal bank account. This should take about 10 minutes.
welcome.accountTypeQuestion: What type of account are you opening?
welcome.currentDesc: Standard personal banking for daily transactions, payments, and savings. Suitable for residents and non-residents.
welcome.privateDesc: Wealth management and private banking services for high-net-worth individuals. Minimum deposit typically required.
welcome.nextStep2: Verify your identity and contact details
welcome.nextStep3: Match you with Opulanz Partner Bank

identity.title: Your Identity & Contact
identity.description: We need to verify your identity and contact information for regulatory compliance.

intent.title: Account Intent
intent.description: Help us understand your banking needs so we can match you with the right partner bank.
intent.residentEurope: I am a resident of a European country
intent.residentEuropeDesc: You live and pay taxes in a European Union member state
intent.nonResidentDesc: You live outside of Europe but want a European bank account
intent.countryQuestion: Which country do you reside in?
intent.countryHelp: This helps us match you with the appropriate banking partner
intent.currenciesHelp: Select all currencies you plan to use for transactions
intent.monthlyTransfersHelp: This helps us recommend appropriate account features and limits
intent.selectSourceOfFunds: Select your primary source of funds
intent.specifySourceOfFunds: Please specify your source of funds
intent.sourceOfFundsHelp: Required for compliance and anti-money laundering checks
intent.pepDescription: I confirm that I am not a Politically Exposed Person (PEP) or subject to any international sanctions. PEPs include government officials, senior politicians, and their close associates.
intent.pepWarning: If you are a PEP or subject to sanctions, additional verification will be required
intent.whyNeededDesc: Based on your residence status and location, we'll match you with Opulanz Partner Bank that can best serve your needs and comply with local banking regulations.
intent.privateBankingNoticeDesc: Private banking typically requires a minimum deposit (€100,000+) and provides dedicated relationship management, wealth advisory, and investment services.

documents.title: Eligibility & Documents
documents.description: Upload the required documents for identity verification and compliance.
documents.addressProof: Proof of Address (utility bill, bank statement)

review.title: Review & Consents
review.description: Please review your information and provide the necessary consents to proceed.

welcome.title: Welcome to Business Banking
welcome.description: Let's get started with opening your business bank account. This process should take about 15-20 minutes.
welcome.accountOpeningDesc: Whether you have an existing company or want to start a new one, we'll guide you through the process of opening a business bank account with Opulanz Partner Bank.
welcome.need2: Information about directors and beneficial owners (UBOs)
welcome.need3: Identity documents for all directors and UBOs
welcome.need5: Company formation details (if starting a new company)
welcome.processingTimeDesc: Business account applications typically take 5-10 business days to review. We may contact you for additional information during the review process.

companyStatus.title: Company Status
companyStatus.description: Tell us about your company so we can provide the right banking solution.
companyStatus.question: Do you have an existing company or want to start a new one?
companyStatus.existingDesc: I already have a registered company and need a bank account for it.
companyStatus.newDesc: I want to start a new company and need help with company formation and banking.
companyStatus.formationServiceDesc: We'll help you form your company in your chosen jurisdiction and open a bank account simultaneously. This streamlined process saves time and ensures everything is set up correctly.

jurisdiction.title: Intended Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.newQuestion: Where would you like to form your company?
jurisdiction.jurisdictionHelp: This determines which banking partner and regulatory framework will apply
jurisdiction.luxembourgInfo: Luxembourg: Premier financial center with favorable tax regime for holding companies. Corporate tax rate: ~24%.
jurisdiction.luxembourgCapital: Minimum share capital: €12,000 for S.à r.l. (limited liability company)
jurisdiction.franceInfo: France: Large economy with access to EU market. Corporate tax rate: ~25%.
jurisdiction.franceCapital: Minimum share capital: €1 for SAS/SARL (most common structures)
jurisdiction.finlandInfo: Finland: Stable Nordic economy with strong digital infrastructure. Corporate tax rate: 20%.
jurisdiction.finlandCapital: Minimum share capital: €2,500 for Oy (limited company)
jurisdiction.otherInfo: We'll match you with Opulanz Partner Bank that serves companies in your selected jurisdiction. Specific requirements and timelines will be provided after application review.
jurisdiction.formationTimelineDesc: Company formation typically takes 2-4 weeks. We'll guide you through the entire process and help you open your bank account simultaneously.

directors.title: Directors & Beneficial Owners
directors.description: Provide information about company directors and ultimate beneficial owners (UBOs).
directors.ubosDescription: Individuals who own 25% or more of the company
directors.whyNeededDesc: Banks are required by law (KYC/AML regulations) to know who controls the company. This helps prevent financial crime and ensures transparency.

formation.title: Company Formation Details
formation.serviceDesc: We'll handle the entire company formation process including registration, drafting articles of association, and setting up your corporate structure.
formation.proposedNameHelp: We'll check availability and suggest alternatives if needed
formation.businessActivityPlaceholder: Describe your business activities (e.g., software development, consulting, e-commerce)
formation.timelineDesc: The company formation process typically takes 2-4 weeks. We'll keep you updated at each stage and coordinate the bank account opening to minimize delays.

documents.title: Business Documents
documents.description: Upload the required business and identity documents for verification and compliance.

review.title: Review & Consents
review.description: Please review your information and provide the necessary consents to proceed.

fields.pep: Are you a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)?

documents.help: Please upload clear photos or scans of the following documents (max 15MB each)

sourceOfFunds.placeholder: Please describe the origin of your funds...

consents.kyc: I consent to identity verification and compliance checks as required by law
consents.terms: I agree to Opulanz Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy

steps.app: Download our mobile app or access web banking
steps.security: Set up your account security (2FA, PIN)

companyFormation.subtitle: Company formation assistance, Full service from incorporation to consulting
companyFormation.description: Choose the legal structure that best fits your business needs
companyFormation.heroSubtitle: Complete company formation services with expert guidance. Choose your structure and start your formation wizard.
companyFormation.chooseFormDesc: Select the legal structure that best fits your business needs
companyFormation.processDesc: We guide you through every step of the company formation
companyFormation.benefitsTitle: Why Form Your Company with Opulanz?

benefits.expertDesc: Our team of Luxembourg corporate law experts guide you through every step of the formation process.
benefits.fastDesc: Complete the online wizard in minutes. Most formations completed within 2-3 weeks.
benefits.fullServiceDesc: From notary coordination to RCS registration, we handle everything for you.

step1.changeNote: You can change the company type by going back to the selection page.

step2.proposedNameHelp: Include the legal form suffix (S.à r.l., S.A., etc.)
step2.alternateNameHelp: In case your first choice is not available
step2.purposePlaceholder: Describe the main business activities and purpose of the company...
step2.registeredOfficePlaceholder: Street address, postal code, city, Luxembourg
step2.registeredOfficeHelp: Or select domiciliation service in Step 6

step3.noShareholders: No shareholders added yet. Click "Add Shareholder" to begin.
step3.noDirectors: No directors added yet. {formType} requires at least {count} directors.
step3.noManagers: No managers added yet. {formType} requires at least {count} manager.
step3.ubosDesc: Individuals who own or control more than 25% of the company
step3.isPep: This person is a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)

step4.capitalError: Capital amount must be between {min} and {max}
step4.paidUpHelp: For SA, at least 25% must be paid up at incorporation
step4.noContributions: No contributions added yet. Add cash or in-kind contributions.

step5.naceCodeHelp: Statistical classification of economic activities in the EU.
step5.expectedTurnoverHelp: Estimated annual revenue for the first year
step5.numberOfEmployeesHelp: Expected number of employees when starting operations
step5.whyWeAskDesc: This information helps us prepare accurate documentation and advise you on applicable regulations, tax obligations, and reporting requirements.

step6.notaryNamePlaceholder: Leave blank to let us choose
step6.needDomiciliation: I need a domiciliation / registered address service
step6.needDomiciliationDesc: We can provide you with a professional business address in Luxembourg for your registered office.
step6.noDomiciliationNote: If you don't select domiciliation service, you must provide proof of a registered address (lease agreement or property title) in the next step.

step7.idDocumentsDesc: Upload ID or passport copies for all directors, managers, and UBOs
step7.leaseDesc: Proof of registered office address in Luxembourg
step7.capitalCertDesc: Can be uploaded after payment. Bank certificate confirming capital deposit.
step7.simulationNote: This is a simulation. In production, files would be uploaded to secure cloud storage.

step8.feeDescription: This covers our administrative and coordination services. Notary and registration fees are separate and will be communicated by the notary.
step8.accuracyConfirm: I confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete to the best of my knowledge
step8.acceptAllConsents: Please accept all consents to submit

submitted.title: Formation Dossier Submitted!
submitted.description: Your company formation dossier has been created. Our team will review it and contact you within 24-72 hours to proceed with the notarization and registration process.
submitted.emailConfirmation: You'll receive an email confirmation shortly.

confirmation.step5Desc: Your dedicated account manager will help you get started with our services

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back! Here's your account overview.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Book a consultation with our advisory team

FR.banking: Opulanz is a digital banking platform. Banking services are provided by licensed partners regulated by ACPR (Autorité de Contrôle Prudentiel et de Résolution).
FR.investment: Investment services are subject to MiFID II regulations and provided by advisors authorized by AMF (Autorité des Marchés Financiers).
FR.insurance: Insurance distribution is subject to IDD (Insurance Distribution Directive) requirements. Opulanz acts as an insurance intermediary.
FR.mortgage: Mortgage services are provided by licensed credit intermediaries. Subject to responsible lending requirements.

LU.banking: Banking services are provided by licensed and regulated partners.
LU.investment: Investment advisory services comply with Luxembourg law and MiFID II regulations.
LU.insurance: Life insurance products distributed in compliance with Luxembourg insurance law and IDD requirements.
LU.mortgage: Mortgage services provided by regulated credit institutions in Luxembourg. Subject to consumer protection laws.

metadata.title: Opulanz - Professional Digital Banking
metadata.description: Trusted digital banking, company formation, and advisory services for entrepreneurs and businesses in France and Luxembourg.

landing.heroSubtitle: Access carefully selected European real estate opportunities through professionally managed Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) structures, available exclusively to qualified investors.

whatIsSpv.title: What is an SPV?
whatIsSpv.description: A Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) is a dedicated legal entity created specifically to hold and manage a real estate asset. Each SPV isolates the investment, providing clear legal separation, professional governance, and transparent reporting for investors.

protection.title: Asset Protection
protection.description: Each SPV isolates the property asset, shielding investors from unrelated liabilities.

governance.title: Professional Governance
governance.description: Expert management, regulatory compliance, and fiduciary oversight throughout the SPV lifecycle.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: Detailed quarterly reports, audited financials, and full visibility into SPV operations and performance.

exit.title: Defined Exit Strategy
exit.description: Structured maturity terms and predefined exit options as set out in contractual documentation.

howItWorks.title: A Private, Invitation-Based Process
howItWorks.description: Our SPV investment opportunities are available exclusively through a private, invitation-based process to ensure regulatory compliance and investor suitability.

contact.title: Initial Contact
contact.description: Reach out to our advisory team to express your interest in real estate SPV investment opportunities.

qualification.title: Qualification Review
qualification.description: Our team reviews your investor profile, conducts suitability assessments, and completes KYC/AML verification.

access.title: Portal Access
access.description: Qualified investors receive secure portal credentials to view available SPV offerings and documentation.

investment.title: Investment & Monitoring
investment.description: Select opportunities, complete documentation, execute via bank transfer, and track your investment over time.

cta.title: Interested in SPV Investment Opportunities?
cta.description: Contact our advisory team to learn more about current and upcoming real estate SPV investment opportunities. Access is available by invitation only.

contactForm.title: Request Information
contactForm.description: Provide your details and our team will be in touch to discuss SPV investment opportunities.
contactForm.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your investment interests and objectives...
contactForm.success: Thank you for your interest. A member of our team will contact you shortly.
contactForm.disclaimer: This page is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute a public offer, solicitation, or investment advice. Access to detailed investment information is available exclusively through restricted, invitation-based access following appropriate investor verification.

login.title: Investor Portal
login.subtitle: Enter your access code to view investment opportunities
login.error: Invalid access code. Please contact your advisor for assistance.
login.help: Need access? Contact your Opulanz advisor or reach out to our team.
login.securityNotice: This portal is restricted to authorised investors only

dashboard.title: Investor Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to your SPV Investment Portal

offerings.title: SPV Offerings
offerings.subtitle: Browse current SPV investment opportunities
offerings.noOfferings: No offerings match your current filters.

bankTransfer.title: Bank Transfer Instructions
bankTransfer.description: To participate in this offering, please transfer your investment amount to the following account:
bankTransfer.important: Important: Please include the payment reference to ensure your investment is correctly allocated to this SPV.

offeringDetail.disclaimer: This information is provided to authorised investors only and does not constitute investment advice. Past performance is not indicative of future results. All investments carry risk, including the potential loss of capital.

documents.title: Document Centre
documents.subtitle: Access and download your investment documents
documents.noDocuments: No documents match your search criteria.

login.title: Admin Portal
login.subtitle: Enter your administrator access code
login.error: Invalid admin code. Please check your credentials.
